abstract: Enlisting Mr. Giuliani in an advertising campaign as the operator of the Indian Point nuclear complex seek a renewal of its operating license.
snippet: Enlisting Mr. Giuliani in an advertising campaign as the operator of the Indian Point nuclear complex seek a renewal of its operating license.

headline.main: Giuliani Ads to Promote Safety of Indian Pt.
headline.print_headline: Giuliani Ads Will Promote The Safety Of Indian Pt.
